Description:
Failed to take reasonably practicable precautions to prevent injury to walker using public footpath, resulting in attack by cattle leaving one dead , one injured.
Prosecuted in their capacity as a partner in J H Sharpe & Son.
Guilty plea, referred to sentence on 8/2/22.
LAO and S Clegg PQSB took case.
DJ Kitson presiding. 
12 weeks suspended for 12 months, 750 fine with 128 victim surcharge. Full costs.
Offence Date: This case did result from the investigation of a fatality
